subject: Issue when turning on wheel base.
description_text:
Hi,

I recently purchased the Simsonn plus x pedal set Order #SSN3720.
When I have both my wheel and pedals turned on at the same time, I have a
lot of static from the break pedal input. Is there any way to fix this as I
can't use the pedals like this?

In the attached video, I have the wheel base turned on, then I turn it off
and then I turn it back on again.

Thanks in advance,
Kevin

-- 
Kevin Iseborn
keviniseborn@googlemail.com
+44 7718276785

conversations.body_text: Hi Kevin I,  If this happens, it indicates that the computerâ€™s grounding is not reliable, possibly because a three-prong plug was not used with a three-prong wall outlet. You can refer to the post below: connect the computer case to the stand, and connect the control box to the metal screws on the pedals. This should resolve the disconnection issue.  https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding

This was very helpful, thank you.
